entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:56 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 03:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:07 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
